title: [OpenMP][NFC] Use pass by const ref for Dependencies
body:
Static analysis flagged the passing of Dependencies to emitTargetCall as a
place we could use std::move to avoid copying. A closer look indicated we could
instead turn the parameter into a const & and not have a default value since it
was only used in two lines in a test and changing those two locations was easy.
commits:
[OpenMP][NFC] Use pass by const ref for Dependencies

Static analysis flagged the passing of Dependencies to emitTargetCall as a
place we could use std::move to avoid copying. A closer look indicated we could
instead turn the parameter into a const & and not have a default value since it
was not utlized in tree at all.
Actually remove the default value like I intened to in the first commit.
Add default value for Dependencies in two tests.
